properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Cape Shoalwater WA to Cascade Head OR out 10 nm; Waters from Cape Shoalwater WA to Cascade Head OR from 10 to 60 nm; Waters from Cascade Head to Florence OR from 10 to 60 nm; Coastal waters from Cascade Head to Florence OR out 10 nm
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 11 at 2:40PM PST until January 13 at 12:00AM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts to 30 kt through
tonight, becoming northwest 25 to 35 kt with gusts to 45 kt.
Combined seas 22 to 25 ft at 13 seconds this evening, subsiding
to 18 to 22 ft at 13 seconds tonight. Seas will build back to
around 23 to 27 ft at 13 seconds on Sunday.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Cape Shoalwater WA to Florence OR
out 60 NM.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, until 8 AM PST Sunday. For
the Gale Warning, from 8 AM to midnight PST Sunday night.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM PST SUNDAY... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TO MIDNIGHT PST SUNDAY
